p.s: The given scene, from the movie The Hate U Give directed by George Tillmann Jr. in 2018, is about Chris apologizing to Starr, because he pushed her to take the next step in the relationship.
The viewer observes Chris walking through the school hall.
Starr looks at him, while she is at her locker.
As soon Chris sees her, she turns around.
He puts his headphones over her head.
She confronts him about what he did last time.
He tries to apologize and explain to her, why he did that.
He tells her that he made the beat for her and asks how she liked it.
She answers him that she toughtthought it was okay.
He was not satisfied with the answer, so he plays the beat on full volume and dances to it infrontin front of everyone in the hall.
